Uses of Interface
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.IMutableConfiguration

Packages that use IMutableConfiguration
Package
Description
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration
Provides support for generalized configuration based on a set of IConfigurationFeature values.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint
Support for validating bound objects using Metaschema constraints.
